name: Space Station 2D
description:
This is my 2D Platform Project called Space Station 2D

Modifications:

  1. Complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  2. Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game (In total are 3 levels in the game)
  3. Different UI Menus Design and Font
  4. Different background sounds for Main Menu and levels.

Instructions:

  • Move: a,w,s,d
  • Pause Game: Esc
  • Jump: Space
  • Doble Jump: Space x2

Credits:

Created by Andres Navarro
